text:
Hello Everyone, i am using Franklin for our webiste and i am facing one issue, Latest articles and press release articles are not getting indexed in Google news. Please let me know if anyone can help me to rectify this issue.

<https://juliacomputing.com/feed.xml>

<https://news.google.com/publications/CAAqBwgKMKiHoAswtZG4Aw?hl=en-US&gl=US&ceid=US%3Aen>

attachments.title: Julia Computing - Google News
attachments.text: Read full articles from Julia Computing and explore endless topics, magazines and more on your phone or tablet with Google News.
attachments.fallback: Google News: Julia Computing - Google News

elements.text: Hello Everyone, i am using Franklin for our webiste and i am facing one issue, Latest articles and press release articles are not getting indexed in Google news. Please let me know if anyone can help me to rectify this issue.

text:
I'm not familiar with Google news but it seems you submit your RSS feed. The RSS stuff is being worked on at the moment (it's a bit of a disaster...). Is this a case of "it worked before it doesn't now" or it just never worked properly? Either way could you open an issue on GitHub?

If it worked before and not now, please for now pin the Franklin version to what it was before (`0.10.30` for instance).

elements.text:

text: it was working fine till february 2021. I will raise issue in GitHub

text: could you try pinning the version to precisely `0.10.30` ?

text: (sorry, RSS handling is a mess because the specs are so crappy; I tried to fix a few things in another context and ended up breaking some stuff unknowingly, I'm now working to fix it but it'll take me a few days as I don't want to rush it this time...)
